comment.author: 61368693@N02
comment._content: This is the same type of airplane as flown by Capt Maurice F. Graham when he disappeared on January 11 1931, on a mail flight from Las Vegas to Salt Lake City (N420E). The airplane was not located until June of the same year near Cedar City, Utah. Capt Graham's body was not found until weeks later... still carrying the mail bag. Col Al Matheson (435) 586-9762
